content:
To calculate the product of cell E2 and G2, and then add it to the product of cell K2 and M2 in Google Sheets, you can use the following formula:
```markdown
=E2*G2+K2*M2
```
This will multiply the values in cells E2 and G2, then add the product of cells K2 and M2 to that result, giving you the final value.
